text:
Wait a minute! I just found that we actually have a beta feature that offers these categories for cookies: Necessary, Analytics, Advertisement, and Functional.
<@UMBCXLBG8> could Jaydip be added into the beta for this feature?
Thanks for tagging me, and excellent <@UNWHHSWHJ> glad you got access! Would love to know what you think :slightly_smiling_face:
Sounds like this is something HubSpot is exploring? Hopefully this ability gets added in the future.
This should help: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/cms-general/replace-your-brand-domain>. Make sure to read the additional steps for the top-level domain since you're changing from .com to .org.

Hi everyone, we have a Blog template that on the frontpage it shows the newest post as a "hero" (larger) and then follows a list of 6 blog posts, for that I had to set number of posts per listing page to 7, but now using pagination on the next page I also get 7, which is not ideal since they are displayd 3 posts per row. Is there a way I can dynamically change that to say 9?
